author: Staff Reporter
text:
Prabu Shankar insisted that employees participate in booth-level voter enrolment camps

Striking government employees stage a demonstration here on Saturday condemning Cheyyar Sub Collector R. Prabu Shankar for insisting them to participate in the booth-level voter enrolment camps.

The government employees of different departments held ‘uprising day’ event in Tamil Nadu Revenue Officers Association office in taluk office premises on Saturday.

Meanwhile R. Jothi Sankar, district president of TNROA reportedly spoke to Mr. Prabu Shankar not to insist striking employees to participate in the voter enrollment camps.

The Sub Collector reportedly objected to the representation and the conversation had not gone well.

Irked by the way in which the Sub Collector dealt with Mr. Jothi Sankar’s call, the employees suddenly assembled in front of the RDO’s office and staged a demonstration.

Prabu Shankar insisted on staff to participate in booth level voter enrolment camps
title: Striking staff condemn Cheyyar Sub Collector
